name: Create Smaily subscriber from new Google Sheets rows
description: Every time a new subscriber is added to your Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically add a new subscriber to Smaily. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ult3vSo5Tdt49d9BwUrjXluvK7Uh5uDcUqz0Q26pxUQ/edit#gid=0)
